text: Ara niscaya'i tadera madhyera ekadala granthapathe tadera jihbake pakiye-bamkiye tole yena tomara bhabate paro ta grantha theke'i, athaca ta grantha theke naya. Ara tara bale -- ''iha allah‌ra kacha theke’’ yadi'o uha allah theke naya. Ara tara allah sanbandhe mithyakatha bale, yadi'o tara jane.
